Package org.javascool.gui

Interface Summary
Editor Editor interface This interface define functions that will be in all editors It must extends from a JPanel to include it in a tab The editor is included in a FileEditorTabs
FileEditorTabs The FileEditorTabs Interface This interface define functions to have a FileEditorTabs
Widget  
 

Class Summary
JVSAboutFrame Open the About Windows
JVSFileEditorTabs The JVSFileEditorTabs A powerful JVSTabs to manage a multi-file editing.
JVSHtmlDisplay Defines a panel in which a HTML text is shown.
JVSMainPanel The main panel for Java's cool This class wich is very static contain all that we need to run Java's cool like save and open file command.
JVSMainPanel.Dialog  
JVSSplitPane The main Split Pane This JSplitPane is used to place the FileEditor and the rights tabs
JVSStartPanel  
JVSTabs Create a tab structure Java's cool Tab Structure is used to make easy JTabbedPane
JVSToolBar The JVS top tool bar
JVSWidgetPanel  
TabPanel Component to be used as tabComponent; Contains a JLabel to show the text and a JButton to close the tab it belongs to
